pageContext.title: What is Class 5 Hearing Aid Repair?
pageContext.description: What is Class 5 Hearing Aid Repair?
pageContext.data:
What is Class 5 Hearing Aid Repair?

Class 5 Hearing Aid Repair includes the following options:

  • When the hearing aid is beyond repair (Damage Hearing aid)
  • Class 4 repair (Upgraded)
  • Replacement of damge mold (shell) Current Impression needed
  • Reprogram to current audiogram (Hearing Test)

breadcrumbs.name: What is Class 5 Hearing Aid Repair?
